actions.recommendation: PSA testing: annually, from age 40 if one first-degree relative who had prostate cancer at <65yrs or female relatives diagnosed with BRCA1 or BRCA2 gene mutation breast cancer. From age 45 if history of prostate cancer on either the mother or fatherâ€™s side.From age 50: every 2 years

Increased abdominal circumference is not limited to fat under the skin but also fat around the organs of your abdomen, it's linked with Type 2 diabetes, high BP& breathing problems. Eat whole unprocessed foods, practice good sleep hygiene, and try to manage your stress

High insulin levels happens when the pancreas makes more insulin to process high levels of carbohydrates in the blood.Type 2 diabetes develops when pancreas can no longer make large amounts of insulin needed for normal blood sugar, please reduce your carbohydrate intake.
Recurrent headaches with the heat, advised on hydration, to consult a family doctor if persists.
